name: Marc STEEL, D.D.S. v. Steven L. WEISBERG, D.D.S. Appeal of Charles R. WEBER, D.M.D.

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
LaRSEN and McDERMOTT, JJ., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Marc STEEL, D.D.S. v. Steven L. WEISBERG, D.D.S. Appeal of Charles R. WEBER, D.M.D.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LaRSEN and McDERMOTT, JJ., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Thomas A. Beckley, Jeffrey W. Davis, Charles O. Beckley, II, for appellant.
Ronald J. Klimas, Donald A. Browns, for Marc Steel, D.D.S.
Steven R. Sparks, Edward J. Schwabenland, for Steven L. Weisberg, D.D.S.
casebody.head_matter:
582 A.2d 648
Marc STEEL, D.D.S. v. Steven L. WEISBERG, D.D.S. Appeal of Charles R. WEBER, D.M.D.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 22, 1990.
Decided Nov. 9, 1990.
Thomas A. Beckley, Jeffrey W. Davis, Charles O. Beckley, II, for appellant.
Ronald J. Klimas, Donald A. Browns, for Marc Steel, D.D.S.
Steven R. Sparks, Edward J. Schwabenland, for Steven L. Weisberg, D.D.S.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
